Description:
As a user I want to authenticate myself with the server
So that other users can't submit stories as me!

As a user
I want to submit a link
So that I can share sweet stuff I found on the web with the SnakerNews community

Story: User can see a list of submitted stories
Description:
As a user
I want to see a list of stories
So that I can consume moar information

Reqs:
Ordered by upvotes - downvotes
Timestamp of submission is displayed
User who submitted the story is displayed

Bonus:
Instead of the URL, the HTML title of the link should be displayed

As a user
I can downvote or upvote a story
In order to make my opinion know

Reqs:
User can only upvote OR downvote a story once.

Story: User can comment on a story
Description:
As a user
I want to leave a comment on a story
So that I can fill the internet with dribble

Story: [Bonus] User can mark a story as "red"
Description:
As a user
I want to mark stories as read ("red")
So that I don't see them anymore
